Load a package into a truck.desc: This action enables the agent to load a package into a truck. For example, load a package_1 into a truck_1.

Unload a package from a truck.desc: This action enables the agent to unload a package from a truck. For example, unload a package_1 from a truck_1.

Load a package into an airplane.desc: This action enables the agent to load a package into an airplane. For example, load a package_1 into an airplane_1.

Unload a package from an airplane.desc: This action enables the agent to unload a package from an airplane. For example, unload a package_1 from an airplane_1.

Drive a truck from one location to anoth.desc: This action enables the agent to drive a truck from one location to another in a city. For example, drive a truck_1 from location_1 to location_2 in city_1.

Fly an airplane from one city to another.desc: This action enables the agent to fly an airplane from one city's airport to another. The airports are locations in the city. For example, fly an airplane_1 from location_0 to location_1.
